scripts.deploy:customer: pnpm build:customer && cd apps/customer && npx wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name dinein-customer
scripts.deploy:venue: pnpm build:venue && cd apps/venue && npx wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name dinein-venue
